name: Sweet Farm Bubble 2
description:
Sweet Farm Bubble 2!!!
This is a real shooting ball & puzzle game that contains nice graphics and an adventure story. Use your skill to size up the perfect shots and shoot bubbles like a charm. It’s a fun and addictive shooting ball game!

Features
• With 160 free levels and many attractive magic puzzles
• Full HD graphics, sound MUCH and many interesting fruits, eye catching
• Create combo to generate new power-ups, unexpectedly
• Game of leisure, with 4 game modes full of action and adventure
